Title: Prohibits disclosure of immigration status for victims of domestic violence; adds enhanced penalties for coercive threats to expose immigration status of victims
Summary: Prohibits disclosure of immigration status for victims of domestic violence; adds enhanced penalties for coercive threats to expose immigration status of victims and witnesses of domestic violence.
LawCode: Amd §§140.10 & 530.11, add §2.25, CP L; amd §459-h, Soc Serv L; amd §812, Fam Ct Act; add §70.11, Pen L; add §844, Exec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law, the social services law, the family court act, the penal law and the executive law, in relation to maintaining the confidentiality of immigration status for victims of domestic violence
